thread.title: Melissa Bick
thread.title_full: Kayla Itsines Bikini Body Guide Workout Discount Site reviewed by Melissa Bick

author: Melissa Bick
title: Melissa Bick
text: I just ordered the BBG Workout program for the discount price of $39.99, which for everything that you get out of it seems extremely worth it. I am not an unhealthy person and do work-out but not consistently and it shows. I'm ready to take that leap to be healthy all around and fit! I just lacked the self motivation to truly get started, and I believe having this program to follow will help me stay on track! Thanks Kayla for the guide. Today starts a new beginning!
